movie.title: Confessions of an Eco-Terrorist
movie.description_intro: Seen through the eyes of activist Peter Jay Brown, Confessions grants the viewer an intimate look at shipboard life amongst these self proclaimed animal saviors and sea rebels who shaped the green movement we know and love today. Peter and his associates' exploits are as much comedy as cause. These extremists proudly fly the skull and cross-bones while performing extraordinary feats of daring on the high seas. Their fleet of ramming vessels inflicts damage to whalers, illegal drift-netters, and seal hunters that operate illegally world-wide. The hard nosed cast of characters exude bravery and whit, all while engaging in action packed conflict including sinkings, boardings, arrests, and plenty of rammings.
movie.description_full: Seen through the eyes of activist Peter Jay Brown, Confessions grants the viewer an intimate look at shipboard life amongst these self proclaimed animal saviors and sea rebels who shaped the green movement we know and love today. movies.title: Yakuza Law
movies.summary: A story of yakuza lynching during the Edo, Taisho, and Showa periods.

movies.title: Belong to Us
movies.summary: An injured dog finds its way into the hearts of a family after escaping an underground dog-fighting ring.
movies.description_full: An injured dog finds its way into the hearts of a family after escaping an underground dog-fighting ring.
movies.synopsis: An injured dog finds its way into the hearts of a family after escaping an underground dog-fighting ring.

movies.title: Dear Mandela
movies.summary: When the South African government promises to 'eradicate the slums' and begins to evict shack dwellers far outside the city, three friends who live in Durban's vast shantytowns refuse to be moved. Dear Mandela follows their journey from their shacks to the highest court in the land as they invoke Nelson Mandela's example and become leaders in a growing social movement. By turns inspiring, devastating and funny, the film offers a new perspective on the role that young people can play in political change and is a fascinating portrait of South Africa coming of age.

movies.title: Apocalypse Pompeii
movies.summary: When a Former Special Ops commando visits Pompeii, his wife and daughter are trapped as Mt. Vesuvius erupts with massive force. While his family fights to survive the deadly onslaught of heat and lava, he enlists his former teammates in a daring operation beneath the ruins of Pompeii.
